content: Everyone's thoughts can be quite fascinating at times.

But... as long as everyone has enough supplies and is happy,
it's a good thing even if they don't need a merchant around!
<style=SizeSmall>...though I do hope they'll still visit sometimes...</style>

And if you need anything at all,
just let me know~!
Alright! I'll have new items in stock every day! Feel free to stop by if you need anything!
Let's have a little chat... <style=SizeSmall>if you don't mind...</style>

I've asked around everywhere but couldn't find any
"Soda Pop-Pop" anywhere...
The reason is — that's not even what it's called!
Please come visit again! ...I-I mean, if you'd like to...
...Mhm, the math checks out. Alright, I'll take these and find a good home for them. Thanks for bringing them to me. Come back anytime!

Oh, you came specially to chat with me? That makes me happy!
But I still need to watch the store...
So maybe we can... just chat for a tiny bit.
I want to buy something

The most important thing in trade,
is how needs and being needed keep flowing in circles,
is getting the right goods into the hands that need them.

The common currency in the Astralink,
besides <color=#8AAB4B>Dough</color> used for trading goods,
there's also a special currency that circulates exclusively within Loomi Co.

That's what a really amazing merchant once said.
It makes so much sense!
       <size=30>If I memorize it, it becomes mine... right?</size>
I have something to sell
They might think it's poisonous...
And compared to trading with Dough, <color=#8AAB4B>Loomi</color> is more like a reward for just living your daily life.

About the Chrysovian Astralink...
I really want to go there, but sometimes I wonder...

...Oh! Your Backpack seems to be full?
Don't worry, I'll send everything through PuffPost!
And um, please remember to check for your delivery!
These raspberries are delicious, they're absolutely wonderful! ...I really mean it...

I heard when the Astralink connects, goods will move along with the Lumia flow...
You know what that sight would be like?
Maybe we could call it a "glowgistics"... <style=SizeSmall>Get it? Glowing logistics...</style>

If there really was an Astralink connecting to the sky,
and everything could run automatically...
would merchants like us even be needed anymore...?

It's actually called "Marble Soda,"
but only Sani calls it "Soda Pop-Pop."
     <size=30>Just like how she likes to call butterflies "flutterbees."</size>

Okay, I'm gonna give her a special title too,
I'll call her "Esassani the Word-Wizard Supreme"!
       <size=30>D-don't tell her I said that though...</size>

How should I transport these collected fish alive...
       <size=30>Um, maybe I should ask Captain Mo about this too...</size>
I'm good, thanks.

This world is simple, but it's got its own charm.
I'm thinking of making Raspberry the specialty product here...
What do you think?

Yeah, I guess it might give people the wrong idea...
But you know what they say...
The weirder stuff sells better! <style=SizeSmall>At least that's what I heard...</style>

When it comes to shopping,
The perfect fit is always the best choice!
Come see what treasures we have in store today!
If you have any questions in life, just ask Captain Mo! Whether it's about fine food and wine or architecture and decor, he's a jack of all trades. It's quite impressive!
These lifestyle rewards can only be redeemed for goods and services provided by Loomi Co.

Let me tell you a secret...
I'm planning to make some improvements based on Captain Mo's tea-making experience,
by turning them into dried fruits... should sell better, right? <style=SizeSmall>I hope my business sense isn't dried up too...</style>

Hi there, <color=#d3b037>{me}</color>!
Glenn's Stall has some
fresh goodies in today!

<color=#d3b037>{me}</color>, what treasures did you bring today?
Let me take a peek!
I'll give you the fairest market price... promise!

Thanks for the Dough!
I hope <color=#d3b037>{me}</color>'s yesterday, today, tomorrow,
and every single day ahead is wrapped in nothing but happiness!
